metadata.synopsis: Patron chatter on Elfsong Tavern - Roger Gherkins the would-be realtor.

0.speaker: Roger Gherkins
0.text: You've got the look of someone's who's ready to buy! When the time comes, look for me - Roger Gherkins!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Roger Gherkins
1.text: I hear you rented the upper floor - went straight through Alan Alyth. You big dummy, you should have talked to me first, I could've got you a bargain rate!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

2.speaker: Roger Gherkins
2.text: The times are grim, I know, but I tell you what, grim times are the best times to invest in real estate.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

3.speaker: Roger Gherkins
3.text: Gortash, Archduke of Baldur's Gate! I hear he's moved into the penthouse at Wyrm's Rock. That place must cost a fortune, per diem.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

4.speaker: Roger Gherkins
4.text: Wait, how did Lorroakan acquire the tower from Ramazith in the first place? Was there a proper transfer of deed? There could be opportunities here.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

5.speaker: Roger Gherkins
5.text: Word on the street is that Gortash has passed away from a sudden ailment. I wonder who will be renting out the Wyrm's Rock penthouse now?

6.speaker: Roger Gherkins
6.text: Sorcerous Sundries, what am I thinking? It's Ramazith's Tower that's the real prime real estate in this transaction!
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

7.speaker: Roger Gherkins
7.text: Keep me in mind - Roger Gherkins, your Baldur's Gate realtor!
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

8.speaker: Roger Gherkins
8.text: Rolan may be the new manager of Sorcerous Sundries, but what I want to know is, who holds the mortgage on that place? They might be looking to refinance. I should check at the Counting House.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

9.speaker: Roger Gherkins
9.text: Whatever happened out in Grey Harbour, the waves made a mess of the waterfront housing in Brampton! Might be able to snap up a few bargains.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

10.speaker: Roger Gherkins
10.text: Look, if you find anything that's not quite right about your rental property, let me know. I'll get Alan to shave the price for you.
10.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

11.speaker: Roger Gherkins
11.text: Sure, the Steel Watchers are just so much scrap now, but how come nobody's talking about the collapse of the foundry? That place is prime real estate, mixed use, residential and industrial! How I'd love to get that contract.

12.speaker: Roger Gherkins
12.text: Lorroakan's dead, but who are his heirs and assigns? I've got to find out, because they're going to need a good real estate agent if they want to flip that Ramazith's Tower - and Roger Gherkins is the man for the job!
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

13.speaker: Roger Gherkins
13.text: Wyrm's Rock penthouse! There must be some way to get a piece of that.
13.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

14.speaker: Roger Gherkins
14.text: Say, it's the city's new hero! I hope you're looking to settle down here. If so, Roger Gherkins is your man for real estate! Once the situation stabilises, of course.
14.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

15.speaker: Roger Gherkins
15.text: Yeah, let's see, buy a shack in Brampton, flip it and snap up a hovel in Heapside - it's the road to riches, my friend! The road to riches.
15.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

16.speaker: Roger Gherkins
16.text: Even in Baldur's Gate, I'm telling you, it's all about location.

17.speaker: Roger Gherkins
17.text: Not that I'd ever get the chance to list the Wyrm's Rock penthouse. Still... Wait a minute, I know a guy!
